channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7649] Support column stats with temporary tables
item.description: Column stats currently not supported with temp tables, see if they can be added.
item.summary: Support column stats with temporary tables

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12665265

Should this be documented in the Statistics wiki? The Usage section seems appropriate, but this jira is already listed in the Current Status section:

  • Statistics in Hive – Usage
  • Statistics in Hive – Current Status (JIRA)
I've updated the temp table docs at https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/LanguageManual+DDL#LanguageManualDDL-TemporaryTables, removing the blurb about column stats not being supported.
Thanks jdere, that seems sufficient. (The doc doesn't need version information because temporary tables are introduced in 0.14.0 by HIVE-7090.)
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
